examples.example: 我今天和朋友们一起分享了美味的披萨，大家都很开心。

translate.english: I shared delicious pizza with my friends today and everyone was very happy.

examples.example: 我过生日的时候，妈妈专门为我订了一个美味的披萨，让我十分感动。

translate.english: When it was my birthday, my mother specially ordered a delicious pizza for me, which made me very touched.

examples.example: 我和家人围坐在一起品尝美味的披萨，享受着欢乐的家庭时光。

translate.english: I sat around with my family to taste the delicious pizza and enjoyed the happy family time.
